jobDescription: Home improvement company over ten years in business, AAA rating with Home Adviser. Not a single mark on licence. Never one unanswered customer complaint. Licensed - Bonded - Insured. Highest commissions in the industry. Need I say more? You must be home improvement sales expert. We will give you leads to close. Call Wayne Pedersen, general manager at 646-829-7755 and send resume to the email enclosed. We are located in Bayside NY but work in all 5 boroughs in New York. Over a thousand customers have written positive reviews on our work. This position won't last so don't hesitate.
